instruction: Generate a list of tasks for a to-do app
output:
- Add new tasks
- Set reminders for tasks
- Reorder tasks
- Mark tasks as complete
- Delete tasks
- Filter tasks by type
- Assign tasks to other users
- Track progress for tasks
- Add notes to tasks
- Set deadlines for tasks
- Log time taken to complete tasks
- Search tasks by keyword
- Flag tasks to be prioritized
- Sort tasks by priority
- Set tags for tasks
- View tasks by tags
- Archive tasks
- Export tasks 
- Set recurring tasks
- Share tasks with other users
